nodes.text: Conversations With Lanius is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on June 9, 2005 and took the form of a transcript of interview of Jedi Master Lanius Qel-Bertuk. It was the second Living Force article to be titled Conversations With Lanius, with the first one being added to Wizards.com in 2003.
